_description: Animation Configuration - Controls transitions, transforms, and keyframe animations. Changes take effect after page reload.
_transitions_info: Transition timing for animated changes. Duration in milliseconds (1000ms = 1 second). Easing controls the acceleration curve

transitions._fast: Fast transition (150ms). Used: Quick hover effects, instant feedback

fast._easing: Easing function: ease (slow start, fast middle, slow end), linear (constant speed), ease-in (slow start), ease-out (slow end), ease-in-out (slow start and end)

transitions._normal: Normal transition (200ms). Used: Mini button borders, standard interactions
transitions._slow: Slow transition (300ms). Used: Smooth, deliberate animations

_transforms_info: CSS transform values for visual effects. Can be combined (e.g., 'scale(0.95) translateY(-2px)')

transforms._scaleDown: Scale down to 95% size. Used: Button press effects
transforms._shiftUp: Move up by 2 pixels. Used: Hover lift effects

_keyframes_info: Keyframe animations define multi-step animations. Each keyframe (0%, 50%, 100%) defines what properties look like at that point in time

keyframes._rotate: Example rotation animation (not currently used in app)

rotate._duration: 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds) for one complete cycle
rotate._timing: Easing: ease-in-out means slow at start and end, faster in middle
rotate._iterations: How many times to repeat: 'infinite' or a number (1, 2, 3, etc.)
rotate._frames: Animation keyframes. 0% = start, 50% = middle, 100% = end. Can use any CSS properties

_gestures_info: Gesture controls for touch interactions. Global crossfader gesture allows controlling crossfader via long press + drag anywhere on screen

gestures._longPressDelay: Time (ms) to hold before gesture activates (500ms = 0.5 seconds)
gestures._longPressThreshold: Max movement (pixels) allowed during long press detection
gestures._dampeningFactor: Higher = more gentle response (finger travels 3x distance crossfader moves)

_howToAdd: To add a new keyframe animation, copy the 'rotate' example and change: name, duration, timing, iterations, and frames. Available transform functions: rotate(), scale(), translateX(), translateY(), skew(), etc.
